Filter abs.description: Returns the absolute value of a number.

Filter AtLeast.description: Limits a number to a minimum value.

Filter AtMost.description: Limits a number to a maximum value.

Filter ceiling.description: Takes a number and returns the next largest integer.

Filter divided by.description: Divides a number by the number provided.

Filter floor.description: Takes a number and returns the next smallest integer.

Filter format.description: Formats the number based on a pattern your provide.

Filter format as currency.description: Provides a simple way to display an internationalized currency amount. The filter uses the currency symbol defined in the 'CurrencySymbol' global attribute.

Filter minus.description: Subtracts a number from the number provided.

Filter modulo.description: The modulo filter returns the remainder of division of one number by another.

Filter NumberToOrdinalWords.description: Takes 1, 2 or 3 and returns first, second or third.

Filter NumberToWords.description: Takes 1, 2 or 3 and returns one, two or three.

Filter RandomNumber.description: Generates a random number between 0 and up to (but not including) the number you pass in as input.

Filter money.description: Provides a simple way to display an internationalized currency amount. The filter uses the currency symbol defined in the 'CurrencySymbol' global attribute.

Filter currency.description: Provides a simple way to display an internationalized currency amount. The filter uses the currency symbol defined in the 'CurrencySymbol' global attribute.

Filter plus.description: Adds a number to the number provided.

Filter times.description: Multiplies a number by the number provided.

Filter to quantity.description: Many times you want to call Singularize and Pluralize to prefix a word with a number; e.g. "2 requests", "3 men". ToQuantity prefixes the provided word with the number and accordingly pluralizes or singularizes the word.
